backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the loan document backend, defining data types (loans, templates, documents, user profiles) and CRUD operations for templates, documents, user profiles, and loan processing records with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of the 'TDS Deduction Intimation' built-in document template, including the required exact body text with dynamic placeholders and the files/components involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted summary of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and recent changes of each file in the loan document generator frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, mounting the React app into a `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that manages form state, PDF generation/download/share logic, and wires together FormSection and template management hooks within a React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/FormSection.tsx: Loan form UI component handling user input for loan details, custom fields, EMI auto-calculation, and triggering document download/share for built-in and custom template types including 'TDS Deduction Intimation'.
frontend/src/components/preview/Template: Renders absolute-positioned overlay elements (background image, watermark, seal, signature) on top of a document preview based on the provided template configuration.
frontend/src/components/PreviewDialog.ts: A modal dialog component that renders a formatted preview of a financial document template, with rich text highlighting for monetary values, percentages, and labeled fields using a Bajaj-branded header/footer layout.
frontend/src/components/TemplateDesigner: A UI component for managing both built-in and custom document templates, supporting logo/seal/signature uploads, template editing, preview, deletion confirmation, and saving to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and identity persistence across page reloads.
A generic React hook that synchronizes a state value with localStorage, initializing from stored data and persisting updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating document templates via the ICP backend actor, including get-all, get-by-id, add, and update operations with structured error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplates.ts: Custom React hook that manages both built-in and custom document templates, handling local state, localStorage persistence, and backend sync via React Query mutations. Includes serialization/deserialization helpers to store full Template objects as JSON inside a GlobalMasterTemplate backend type.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS entry point that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a warm orange/amber color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser file download by creating a temporary anchor element from a Blob URL.
frontend/src/lib/loan/calculateEmi.ts: Exports a function to calculate monthly EMI using the standard reducing-balance formula, plus an Indian-locale currency formatter using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generatePdf.ts: Generates a minimal valid PDF by rendering a document to a canvas as JPEG and embedding it in a hand-crafted raw PDF structure without any external PDF library. Includes template resolution logic for both built-in and custom document types.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/layout.ts: Defines A4 page dimension constants at 96 DPI (794Ã—1123px) along with margin, header height, footer height, and content area layout values.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/renderDocumentToCan: Renders a complete document page onto an HTML canvas by compositing a background, Bajaj Finance header/footer images, optional watermark, and template-driven text content.
frontend/src/lib/shareUtils.ts: Utility that attempts to share a PDF Blob via the Web Share API and returns false to signal a download fallback if sharing is unavailable or fails.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/fileToDa: Converts an image File object to a base64 data URL using FileReader, rejecting non-image files.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/position: Provides helpers to convert a PositionPreset enum value into CSS style objects or canvas pixel coordinates, supporting five preset positions with a margin offset.
frontend/src/lib/templates/getTemplate.t: Defines built-in document template bodies and default Template configurations for loan letter types, and exports functions to retrieve, normalize, and persist templates via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/templates/renderTemplat: Renders a template by replacing double-curly-brace placeholders (e.g., {{name}}, {{loanAmount}}, {{processingCharge}}, custom fields) with actual form data values, returning the substituted headline and body strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates loan form data, returning an array of error messages for missing or invalid fields such as name, loan amount, interest rate, year, and processing charge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/types/form.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and types for form data, including CustomField, LoanType, FormData, and DocumentType used throughout the application.
frontend/src/types/templates.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for template configuration, including Template, CustomTemplate, and settings for background, watermark, seal, and signature image elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH, fonts, border radius, animations) and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state metadata including version, architectural notes, known issues, and a registry of existing features for a loan document templating application.
